description:
Casey is not even a little bit shy. He was actually disappointed that there weren't more camera guys!
"Where is my audience?" he asked jokingly.
Casey was definitely great at making us all laugh.
"I'm used to trying to make people happy," he said. "I try to be that guy."
He recently left the Marines. He was a specialist who taught and trained other Marines.
"I love teaching," he said. "It was a great experience."
Casey is starting college, where he will be studying engineering.
"I love cars," he said. "I'm hoping that I can work in that area some day."
Casey's dick was pretty much hard the entire time we were together.
"You are making my job very easy," I told him.
He laughed.
"You don't have to be kind to me," he said. "I've been in the military. I can take it!"
By the end of the afternoon he was ready to shoot his load.
"Fuck I'm going to cum!"
And, wow, did he! He shot his load right over his head.
"Do you want me to clean that up?" he joked after seeing the "mess" he made...
title: Casey
